SEARCH
Package com.walletapp.servlets

Class AddRecordServlet

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
com.walletapp.servlets.AddRecordServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet("/AddRecordServlet") public class AddRecordServlet extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Handles the creation and insertion of new financial records for a logged-in user.

This servlet processes transaction details submitted from a form or dashboard, constructs a Record object, and persists it using RecordDAO.

  • Validates the user session.
  • Parses form parameters such as amount, category, account, payment details, and date.
  • Converts date strings into Timestamp objects.
  • Associates selected Label objects with the record.
  • Persists record data using RecordDAO and redirects to the records overview page.

Error Handling: Invalid input formats are caught and redirected gracefully with feedback.

Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sayan
